artifacts.summary: Implementation summary documenting Phase 1 archival (29 sorries eliminated), Phase 2 Omega-mismatch investigation (3 approaches analyzed, all blocked), and Phase 5 verification

partial_progress.details: Phases 1 (archival), 2 (investigation), 5 (verification) completed. Phases 3 (coverage/locality proof) and 4 (sorry discharge) blocked by Omega-mismatch: canonicalOmega B != Set.univ, truth is not Omega-monotone, and Omega-parametric validity breaks MF/TF soundness.

review_reason: Omega-mismatch is a genuine mathematical gap. The two sorry placeholders in Representation.lean (standard_weak_completeness, standard_strong_completeness) cannot be discharged without redesigning the validity definition in Validity.lean to add a ShiftClosed condition. This requires architectural decisions about the semantic framework.

completion_data.completion_summary: Archived 29 sorries from active Metalogic/ codebase (RecursiveSeed, SeedCompletion, SeedBMCS, EvalBMCS truth lemma). Investigated three approaches to Omega-mismatch resolution and found all blocked. Active sorry count reduced from 38 to 9. Phases 3-4 blocked: the two Representation.lean sorries require Validity.lean redesign to resolve.
